thread.title: LifePoint beats Street 2Q forecasts - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: LifePoint beats Street 2Q forecasts - Yahoo Finance

author: yahoo
title: LifePoint beats Street 2Q forecasts - Yahoo Finance
text:
BRENTWOOD, Tenn. (AP) _ LifePoint Hospitals Inc. (LPNT) on Friday reported second-quarter net income of $46.4 million.
The Brentwood, Tennessee-based company said it had profit of $1 per share.
The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of 13 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 98 cents per share.
The rural hospital operator posted revenue of $1.27 billion in the period, also topping Street forecasts. Eleven analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $1.23 billion.
LifePoint expects full-year earnings in the range of $3.75 to $4.06 per share, with revenue in the range of $5.15 billion to $5.25 billion.
LifePoint shares have climbed 20 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has increased 17 percent in the last 12 months.
